title: Leading causes of death among black U.S. residents in 2017
yAxis: Percentage of all causes of death
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of all causes of death for 10 number of Months.
The maximum Percentage of all causes of death 23.3 is found at Month Diseases of the heart and the minimum is found at Septicemia where Month is 2.0.
The difference of Percentage of all causes of death between the highest and lowest Month is 21.3.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Percentage of all causes of death in each Month on the y axis.
The Percentage of all causes of death is highest at Month Diseases of the heart and lowest at Month Septicemia.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of all causes of death for 10 number of Months.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of all causes of death for 10 number of Months.
The Percentage of all causes of death is appeared to be the highest at Month Diseases of the heart and lowest at Month Septicemia.
Second maximum Percentage of all causes of death is found at Month .
The maximum Month Diseases of the heart has got 11.65 times higher Percentage of all causes of death than the minimum Month Septicemia.
Percentage of all causes of death at Month Diseases of the heart is 23.3 , second place is  at 23.3, and thirdly is Accidents (unintentional injuries) at 5.9.
The Percentage of all causes of death has reduced over the past 10 Months.
The Month Septicemia tends to be 3.15 percent lower than average.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 73.9.

data.Month: Nephritis nephrotic syndrome and nephrosis (kidney diseases)
